email.title: DoCSoc Pub Quiz with Next Jump
email.sponsor:
\ **Come enjoy a Pub Quiz Night with Next Jumpers!**
As a company, we love playing games and get especially competitive when we play against each other. So, we thought, why not bring some of that fun to DoCSoc. It will be an awesome evening for drinks, games and to test you on your general knowledge!
We even have a small prize in store for the winning group. So, get your teams ready and we hope to see you there!
**Next Jump is Hiring!**
Should you be looking for more than just a fun evening, we are actually hiring! We offer full-time roles to graduates, as well as 3, 6, and 12-month internships to penultimate year students.
If you want your application fast-tracked, please submit to the link below by midnight 18th January. We will invite you to a phone interview in the coming week; and should you be successful, you’ll be asked to join our Super Saturday (assessment centre) on 29th February.
Simply go to these links to submit your CV and join - Graduate Class 2020: https://nextjump.applytojob.com/apply/UWulrrsRCG/Software-Engineer-Web-Applications?source=Imperial+Pre+Pub+Quiz - Intern Class 2020: https://nextjump.applytojob.com/apply/wYfZzpCivx/Software-Engineer-Web-Applications-Internship?source=Imperial+Pre+Pub+Quiz

event.text:
You must be a member of DoCSoc by Tuesday 14th January in order to be admitted. Computing, JMC, and EIE students are automatically members of DoCSoc. Membership is £30. Strictly 18+ only - we will be checking IDs.
Please send an email to us at docsoc@ic.ac.uk if you intend to bring a non-Imperial plus one. Any Imperial plus-ones must have purchased membership, otherwise they will be denied entry.
Our full barnight policy is linked here: http://docsoc.co.uk/barnightpolicy
Find out more: http://docsoc.co.uk/join
